name: Ten Days of Reckoning
description:
Ten Days of Reckoning is an Action Hack and Slash game set in an ancient forsaken land.

It is a fast paced Action RPG where the player will hack and slash their way to defend and fight against hordes of monsters, collecting experience points to upgrade their skills to further customize their chosen way of play.

How to play:

W - forward

S - back

A - left

D - right

Left Click - Attack ( press multiple times for combo )

Right Click - Defend ( not working )
